name: Comment Notifications Plugin for WordPress for use with Google Glass
tagline: WordPress plugin that delivers notifications to the site owner's Google Glass when a new comment is made on the site.
body:
### Welcome to Comment Notifications Plugin for WordPress for use with Google Glass

### Authors and Contributors
* Brandon Dove - PixelJar.net (@brandondove)
* Steve Zehngut - Zeek.com (@stevezehngut)
* Jason Tucker - Tucker.Pro WPMedia.Pro (@jasontucker)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
